resources.string: If you don\'t have any figures to place and your pieces count = 3 you can fly (move to any empty place)
Possible moves are highlighted when you have selected a piece to move
Each circle at the top shows how many pieces of the following color aren\'t placed yet
Circle size shows whose turn it is
If you have less than 3 pieces (including the ones you can place) you lose
If you don\'t have any figures to place and your pieces count > 3 you can move to the next cell (if it is empty)
Possible moves are highlighted when you have selected a piece to move
If you have any pieces left you can place them in any empty place
If you can remove enemies piece simply click on it
If after your move a new row with 3 pieces appears, you can remove enemies piece
Server error, pls try later or report this at GitHub
Network request has failed, check your internet connection
This login is already in use
